title: Looking to buy T206 Juan Violat with Hindu back
author: kmac32

posts.post_title: Looking to buy T206 Juan Violat with Hindu back
posts.post_content:
Hello, 

Know they are rare but looking for a T206 Juan Violat with a Hindu back to complete my T206 Jacksonville players card collection.  Last card needed.  PM me with asking price and we can exchange scans via text or email.  Thanks in Advance.

Ken
